name: Just Climb... (Remake of Hill Climb Racing)
name_original: Just Climb... (Remake of Hill Climb Racing)
description:
Just Climb is a remake of a game called "Hill Climb Racing" by Fingersoft.

Drive the car with "A" (brake), "D" (gas) and the last: "left arrow" (brake), "right arrow" (gas).

Game is made in Unity. I'm going to add gas/breake assets in the game like in the original game, air times, coins and some fuels and distance meters and even respawn.

KNOWN BUGS
  • You can fell off the ground.
  • The antena is... weird...
  • You need to restart the game if you get stuck/die.
  • The drivers head just uh yea, you'll see...
  • You can lose a wheel...
  • The text "Press "R" to restart." can be in other position than the up-right corner, that depends on your monitor resolution (im using 1366x768).
  • The ground isn't unlimited.
